All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApplicationService
This is Application service that handles information of matched internship application related functions
ApprovalProcessor
This is to call method of approve company rep, approve internship or process withdrawal
ApprovalService
This is for approving of internship application service
CareerCenterStaff
This is Career Centre Staff which handles approval
CompanyRepresentative
This is CompanyRepresentative class that creates internship and see student application
ConsoleUI
 
DataLoader<T>
 
FilterManagementService
This is to manager filter service with different categories
FilterManager
This is call on filter method
InternshipApplication
This is InternshipApplication that have important methods related to application such as apply
InternshipFilter
This is the filter function to filter by certain criteria
InternshipFilterService
This is to get the internship with matching characteristic
InternshipFilterServiceImpl
This is to filter out the targeted matching internship
InternshipOpportunity
This is Internship opportunity with its attributes
InternshipService
This is to check if the internship posted matches required student attribute
InternshipViewer
This is to view the filtered internship information
InternshipViewerService
This is to display internship information
SessionManager
 
StaffDataLoader
 
Student
This is student class which will apply for internship

StudentDataLoader
